module.name: interconnect_2d_shape
module.keywords: module, interconnect shape, layered product, electrical, electronic, design intent, priority shape data, two dimensional

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of design data specific to two dimensional representation of layered product definitions. This part extends " Layered_interconnect_module_with_design_intend_modifications_arm" module to add shape data for prioritized aspects of the layout design.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Fabrication joint, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1668;
items within the scope of application module Layered interconnect module with design intent modifications, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1699;
items within the scope of application module Physical unit 2d design view, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1724.
